players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "I trust Diana's investigation. Let's vote Charlie out to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, why are you silent? Your lack of defense is very suspicious. Diana's claim is our only lead."
Charlie: "Bob, Diana is trying to manipulate us. Why would she target me so quickly without proof? This feels like a setup to eliminate the real town members."
Diana: "Charlie, you were silent when accused and only spoke to deflect. My investigation is proof. Bob, we must vote Charlie now to win."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
